price: Alipo wapa katika fadhila yake wakaifanyia ubakhili na wakageuka, na huku wakipuuza.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akiwaitikia na akawapa kwa fadhila yake, wanafanya ubakhili. Hawatoi kitu, wala hawatimizi ahadi, na huiacha kheri wakiipuuza na wakimpuuza Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
